title: Need help with editing a short video
snippet:
Hi, 

I am working on a cool CV video (1:30 min.) and I'm writing a script, wireframes and collecting all materials. 
I am looking for someone to help me with editing (with the materials and script that I'll provide). It doesn't have to be in the highest quality, however I want it to look decent. 
I am limited by budget and looking for someone who can make it in a short time with minimal work. I'll provide whatever needed in terms of materials, narrations, etc.
